pages.text: Affects missile and bolt spells. 10% reduced cooldown, 1 extra damage, and a chance that the missiles explode on impact. This modifier is unique to the (l:amethyst_imbuement:trinkets/spellcasters_focus)Spellcasters Focus$(), to obtain it you must ignite your focus to a new tier and select it from one of three options presented.

pages.mod_text: Your focus grows an affinity for clusters of magical energy commonly known as 'bolts'. Appears on a Spellcasters Focus on tier ignition.
